products.description:
They knelt before him and made obeisance with the utmost humility. The Great Khan bade them rise and received them honorably and entertained them with good cheer. He asked many questions about their condition and how they fared after their departure. - Marco Polo

 
Handblown by the crew at The China Glass in Hebei, China, this unique decorativebubbler is the perfect addition to your fine glass collection. Featuring ancient style blue decorative markings and a traditional red stamp decal, this bubbler is extremely ornate.
products.title: The China Glass "Marco Polo" Standing Bubbler

products.description:
Sit down and take a break with this beautiful piece!

 
This spoon created by China Glass were made with love from Hebei, China. This hand-blown beauty isstamped, true to form, with a vibrant red China Glass stamp.

 
Elegant blue stenciling makes the final piece look like something you would see in a museum, or your fancy Aunt Laurel's china cabinet.
products.title: The China Glass "Kublai" Hammer Bubbler
